meanings.definition: A person or thing that interrupts.
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, the loud interruptor kept cutting off the speaker.
meanings.sent2: The barking dog was a constant interruptor during the movie.
meanings.sent3: The interruptor phone rang just as she was about to reveal the surprise.
meanings.sent4: His sudden sneeze acted as an interruptor to the quiet library.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm served as a powerful interruptor to the peaceful afternoon.

meanings.definition: A device that interrupts an electric current.
meanings.sent1: The circuit breaker is an essential interruptor in electrical systems.
meanings.sent2: He quickly pressed the interruptor to stop the flow of electricity.
meanings.sent3: The interruptor decided to take a break right in the middle of a storm.
meanings.sent4: The interruptor functioned like a gatekeeper, controlling the power flow.
meanings.sent5: Make sure to check the interruptor before attempting any electrical repairs.
